div.p: Greetings. Exhausted by many and lengthy ecclesiastical sermons, I nonetheless send you these few words. The royalists assert with great constancy that Prince Cond√© was killed in battle along with many distinguished men and numerous soldiers on March 13th. What I have received from Geneva from Mr. Beza, translated from Latin into German, I share with you. Believe me, as much as you are dear to me, and although I worry that it has gone badly enough for both sides, I still want to wait for a better and more thorough explanation. Let us pray to the Lord, that He may have mercy on us.
Farewell. Greet the councilors, Mr. Karl, Pontisella, Ganthner, and all friends.
To the most distinguished man, Mr. Tobias Egli, faithful pastor of the Chur church, esteemed lord and dearest brother. Chur.
